name: the Lost CountDown timer
description:
Press the "run game" button to save the world.
Keep in mind, every 104 minutes  these following numbers 4 8 15 16 23 42 (4815162342) must be entered. An alarm will ring to remind you of it.

You can download the windows version for a better ending, but keep in mind : it's better for everyone if there is no end, you must never forget to enter the numbers!
